room_title: Escape room "Raiders of the Lost Art" by That Escape Place in Houston
review: Amazing place to do a double date night! We did the Raiders of the Lost Art room. The room was well thought out, you really have to use your brain! The anticipation was so exciting! We all kept talking about how fun it was for the rest of the evening. Highly recommend! Weâ€™ll be back again!

room_title: Escape room "Raiders of the Lost Art" by That Escape Place in Houston
review: Great premise, great flow, very interesting actual facts learned along the way. Just the right level of difficulties and clues. My family is still talking about it the next day. It was the highlight of our Christmas!

room_title: Escape room "Raiders of the Lost Art" by That Escape Place in Houston
review: Six of us just had a great time finding the lost art! (With 32 whole seconds to spare!) Challenging but accessible puzzles, hints if you ask for them, really well-designed adventure! Can't wait to try the other room!
